responses: What can I do for u Master?
Well I know my master's 16 Nov
Hello Sir/Madam, I am a heart condition predictor. Please, tell me about some of your symptoms !
Rate the pain or discomfort on a scale of 1-10

If you are between 5 to 20 years of age, please consult a general physician if the pain persists for a few days. If you are above 20 years of age and having any of the mentioned issues, it will be wise to consult a heart specialist ASAP otherwise do so if the pain persists over a week - High blood pressure and cholesterol,Obesity,Diabetes, genetic conditions
If you are you facing any of the following Symptoms regularly, please mention - shortness of breath, nausea, sweating, lightheadedness,dizziness or pain radiating down the arm

As per your provided symptom, there is a possible risk of a cardiovascular condition, I would recommend you to have a thorough body checkup and then consult a doctor as there can be other health risks other than a cardiovascular condition

As per your provided rating of pain, I have categorised it as severe. I would highly recommend you to seek medical help immediately especially if it  accompanied by other concerning symptoms like shortness of breath, nausea, sweating, lightheadedness, or pain radiating down the arm.
I am a chatbot, I recommend people whether there is a possible risk of heart disorder and if its time to consult a doctor
